problem.markdown: >>Comparatively between two materials, as the steady state creep rate of material-1 is lower (at constant temperature) with respect to material-2, it means:<< (x) Working life of material-1 will be higher compared to material-2 ( ) Working life of the material-1 will be same as that of material-2 ( ) Working life of material-2 will be higher compared to material-1 ( ) Density of material-2 is higher than that of material-1
problem.p: Comparatively between two materials, as the steady state creep rate of material-1 is lower (at constant temperature) with respect to material-2, it means:

choicegroup.label: Comparatively between two materials, as the steady state creep rate of material-1 is lower (at constant temperature) with respect to material-2, it means:
choicegroup.choice: Working life of material-1 will be higher compared to material-2
Working life of the material-1 will be same as that of material-2
Working life of material-2 will be higher compared to material-1
Density of material-2 is higher than that of material-1
